archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Roll-out Order Handling Infrastructure
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modelled in business process terms, and can be applied (i.e. â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Co-ordination and roll-out, in accordance with approved plans, of the approved new and/or modified customer order handling infrastructure; Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Reserved for future use.
